definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: This is a light comedy and famous for the antiphonal singing of the spouses.
sentences.chinese: 这是一出小喜剧，以夫妻对唱而出名。

sentences.english: We are excited about singing English-songs.
sentences.chinese: 我们对唱英文歌曲感到很兴奋。

sentences.english: This is madrigal that a men and women to sing, have who would like to with me together to sing?
sentences.chinese: 这是一首男女对唱的情歌，有谁愿意和我一起对唱？

sentences.english: This is madrigal that a men and women to sing, have who would like to with me together to sing?
sentences.chinese: 这是一首男女对唱的情歌，有谁愿意和我一起对唱？

sentences.english: She will be a guest performer at the concert, sharing a duet with Lin.
sentences.chinese: 她会是演唱会嘉宾，跟林宥嘉对唱一首歌曲。

sentences.english: It can be divided into two parts ---- mass antiphonal style and Aken antiphonal singing.
sentences.chinese: 它可以分为群众性对唱和阿肯对唱两种。

sentences.english: It can be divided into two parts ---- mass antiphonal style and Aken antiphonal singing.
sentences.chinese: 它可以分为群众性对唱和阿肯对唱两种。

sentences.english: Dare you climb the window of my house I will sing disturbed, duet dolly song with you.
sentences.chinese: 你敢爬我家窗户唱忐忑，我就跟你对唱甩葱歌。

sentences.english: We got through the whole duet, and collapsed laughing.
sentences.chinese: 我们唱完了整首对唱，笑得上气不接下气。

sentences.english: To M. One should not be ashamed of chanting God's holy name.
sentences.chinese: 人不应该对唱颂神的圣名而感到羞耻。

sentences.english: To the love between men and women related to the activities subject to duet.
sentences.chinese: 以男女之间的爱情活动有关的主题来对唱。

definition: to sing opera music (without staging or make up)
vocal accompaniment/to accompany a singer/to support of sb/to echo sb/to chime in with sb
sung performance/to sing for an audience
answering phrase of duet/to sing antiphonal answer
to sing and play (plucked string instrument)
